location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Adolphus Warburton Moore, India Office to Sir Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding questions of ceremonial procedure at Baroda which had been raised by Colonel Robert Phayre. The questions relate to the attendance of the Resident and Troops at the Gunputtee [Ganpati] and Dusseerah [Dussehra] festivals when they fall on a Sunday and asking which of the different statements in relation to this question is correct as well as asking Pelly how he handles such matters in Rajpootana [Rājasthān].
